alert.note: Alert for Graham (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 3:18PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Brief Landspout Tornadoes Possible... At 317 PM CDT, conditions are becoming favorable for the development of landspout tornadoes in Graham County. However, at this time it is unknown which if any storm would produce a landspout. Any tornadoes which develop are expected to pose a limited threat. Locations impacted include... Hill City, Morland, Bogue, Nicodemus, Penokee and Saint Peter. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Goodland. Landspout tornadoes can form with a developing thunderstorm before rain, hail, and even thunder is observed. Landspout tornadoes are not usually associated with a wall cloud and are often difficult to detect with weather radar. &&
